title: Cytomegalovirus infection broadens spectrum of environmental allergens

title_detail.value: Cytomegalovirus infection broadens spectrum of environmental allergens

summary: Cytomegalovirus (CMV) infection can convert a harmless, inhaled protein antigen into an allergen, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Cytomegalovirus (CMV) infection can convert a harmless, inhaled protein antigen into an allergen, according to a new study.
